page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT
page.content: People who work inside and outside Rodley: There were 8{farmers}- mainly everyone was a farmer or farm worker in our area. A milkman was seen delivering milk from door to door inside Rodley. There was an artist and a printer for the financial newspapers who lived in Upper Framilode who worked some distance away. There was an engineer at his house who normally worked outside Rodley. A dairy worker worked outside Rodley, 2 chefs were interviewed in the area and they worked outside Rodley. There is a charity worker and a man who worked for the government in Cheltenham. There was an Elver Station, 2 stables and 2 kennels in the area.
